Name: Flying Bat Nebula
Details: The Flying Bat Nebula is a nebula located in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDeepPeriphery],Deep Periphery]], far [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimward],rimward]] of the [[DM.Factions[faction_MagistracyOfCanopus],Magistracy of Canopus]], on the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAntiSpinward],anti-spinward]] side of the Perseus-Cepherus Cloud Complex.
